GameModel

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • GameModel.World
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class World
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    The dungeon in which the game is played. Holds the 35-room dungeon and all the Area objects which represent each room. The gridMap has room for 400 areas.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • World

        public World()
        Constructor. Generates a new 2D area array, and initializes all the rooms of the dungeon using the makeABunchOfRooms() method, which creates all the areas, places exits, and adds keys.

    • Method Detail

      • addCharacter

        public boolean addCharacter(Character ch)
        Adds a Character object to the World, at the location specified in the Character.
        Parameters:
        ch - The character being added.
        Returns:
        True if hte character was added, false otherwise.

      • moveCharacter

        public java.lang.String moveCharacter(Character ch,
                             Direction dir)
        Checks the passed direction for exits, locked exits, and the possibility of going out of bounds. Returns a string describing to the client what happened and moves the player if successful
        Parameters:
        ch - The character which is being moved.
        dir - The direction in which they are being moved.
        Returns:
        Either "You can't move in that direction", or " leaves to the "

      • advance

        public void advance(Character mover,
           Character target)
        Advances the character towards the target. This moves the character mover 1 space towards the character target.
        Parameters:
        mover - The character advancing.
        target - The character being advanced on.

      • retreat

        public void retreat(Character mover,
           Character target)
        Moves the character mover one space away from the character target.
        Parameters:
        mover - The character retreating.
        target - The character being retreated from.

      • say

        public void say(Character ch,
       java.lang.String message,
       boolean isSocial)
        Says the message to character ch's client as a notification, as well as anyone in the same room as ch.
        Parameters:
        ch - The character who is sending the message.
        message - The message being sent.
        isSocial - False if the name is meant to be displayed, true otherwise.

      • attack

        public void attack(Character attacker,
          Character defender)
        Starts combat between the attacker and the defender.
        Parameters:
        attacker - The character who is striking in combat.
        defender - The character who is being struck.
